Translations.Text: walillahi ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi wa-ila l-lahi tur'jaʿu l-umuru

kuntum khayra ummatin ukh'rijat lilnnasi tamuruna bil-maʿrufi watanhawna ʿani l-munkari watu'minuna bil-lahi walaw amana ahlu l-kitabi lakana khayran lahum min'humu l-mu'minuna wa-aktharuhumu l-fasiquna
lan yadurrukum illa adhan wa-in yuqatilukum yuwallukumu l-adbara thumma la yunsaruna

duribat ʿalayhimu l-dhilatu ayna ma thuqifu illa bihablin mina l-lahi wahablin mina l-nasi wabau bighadabin mina l-lahi waduribat ʿalayhimu l-maskanatu dhalika bi-annahum kanu yakfuruna biayati l-lahi wayaqtuluna l-anbiyaa bighayri haqqin dhalika bima ʿasaw wakanu yaʿtaduna
laysu sawaan min ahli l-kitabi ummatun qaimatun yatluna ayati l-lahi anaa al-layli wahum yasjuduna
yu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi l-akhiri wayamuruna bil-maʿrufi wayanhawna ʿani l-munkari wayusariʿuna fi l-khayrati wa-ulaika mina l-salihina
wama yafʿalu min khayrin falan yuk'faruhu wal-lahu ʿalimun bil-mutaqina
